instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message:
Arrived with liquid damage and severe damage to J9600. Data is important.

Diode mode reading on pin 4 J9600 is 0L and donar board is 0.432. Repaired all other traces on J9600

Is data still saveable if U8600 is replaced from donar board?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: Check continuity between SSD_BOOT_L and SSD_BOOT_LB_L lines.

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: There is no continuity between SSD_BOOT_L and SSD_BOOT_LB_L lines. Does this need to be fixed at J9600?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: Is it possible for this board to boot without J9600?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message:
You must have continuity between all left/right pins of J9600.
If only one is bad, run wire between corresponding pads into board.

Internal SSD connects to PCH through J9600...

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message:
PP1V8_SUS is shorted. Removed everything but CPU but short remains.

CPU needs replacing now in order to retrieve data?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: Can data still be retrieved even with this shorted CPU through J9600?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message:
Data recovery tool exists, to recover data on this board.
Just need to connect it over J9600.

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: Which pins on J9600 need to function with continuity to retrieve data with tool? I already have the tool

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: When the data recovery tool is plugged in the data cable gets very hot. All pins have continuity now

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: All pins from the right side (regarding of schematic) connect to the tool.

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: No response on tool. All pins have continuity now but pin 4 SSD_BOOT_LB_L is 0.77 diode and on donar is 427. Is this bad U8600?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: May have chip issue, or bad solder.

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: Trying to replace U8600 pad 315 PP1V8_SSD_HOT is missing however all other pads are present after cleanup. Will replacement U8600 still work for data recovery with this pad missing?

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: The other pads should support 1V8_SSD_HOT power rail.

threads.title: 820-00923 no power
threads.message: To save trouble of replacing U8600 would the data be readable or even boot into the OS if U9120/U9200/U9100 were moved and soldered to a working 820-00923 board since these have the T1 chip?
